articles.description: The Xiaomi 14 Ultra offers some serious camera hardware, including a main 1-inch sensor. But the real fun starts when you connect the upgraded accessory grip.

articles.author: Om Gupta
articles.title: Vivo T3 5G goes on sale in India: Check price, offer, availability - India TV News
articles.description: Within a week of its launch, the Vivo T3 5G is now available for sale in the country. It comes with a MediaTek Dimensity chipset, a 5,000mAh battery with wired fast charging support, an AMOLED display, a dual rear camera unit, and much more.
articles.content: Vivo recently launched its Vivo T3 5G smartphone in India. Now, within a week of its launch, the smartphone is available for sale in the country. The newly launched smartphone succeeds the Vivo T2 5G… [+2094 chars]
